{'component_name': 'Geolocation Component', 'description': '**Core Technologies:**
- Node.js v16+ and Express.js v4.17+
- MongoDB v5.0+ for mock regional configuration storage
- MaxMind GeoIP2 Database for simulated location detection
- Basic JWT for mock session management
- In-memory caching for mock data caching

**Build and Development Tools:**
- npm for package management
- ESLint for code quality
- Jest for unit testing
- Swagger/OpenAPI for API documentation
- Docker for containerization
- Git for version control', 'framework': None, 'interfaces': '', 'algorithms': '', 'pseudocode': '', 'figma_components': []}
